subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Experts are predicting that Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao may take risks they normally do not take in their title bout in Las Vegas, but a knockout is still unlikely.
snippet: Experts are predicting that Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao may take risks they normally do not take in their title bout in Las Vegas, but a knockout is still unlikely.
